description:
Balsamiq is a wireframing and mock up tool with a high focus on usability. Quickly come up with mock ups and easily share them with your clients.

Because Balsamiq is commercial software, this package will install Balsamiq as a fully-functional trial. If you have a license key you can activate the software after install.

This package is specific to version 3 of Balsamiq Mockups for Desktop. If you need version 2, check out the [version 2 package](https://chocolatey.org/packages/balsamiqmockups.install).

This package supports registration during install. Just pass the following parameters:

* License code: `/licenseCode:"<your license code>"`
* Name of the license holder: `/licenseName:"<your name>"`

Example:

`-params '"/licenseCode:""abcd1234=="" /licenseName:""John Doe"""'`

For questions about this package, please leave a comment on the package page at https://chocolatey.org/packages/balsamiqmockups3 or create an issue on Github at https://github.com/mattheyan/Chocolatey-Packages/issues.
summary: Balsamiq is a wireframing and mock up tool with a high focus on usability. Quickly come up with mock ups and easily share them with your clients.
author: Balsamiq Studios
